name: FOUND YOU! (A game inspired by primary colour man)
name_original: FOUND YOU! (A game inspired by primary colour man)
description:
Where are you?  How are you here?  Who is chasing you? How did it get here? Why doesn't it move when you look at it?  Find your keys, find the doors, GET. OUT. Before it FINDS YOU!

This game was made for the Primary Color Man Jam 2022 in 14 procrastianting days. The character Primary Color Man was created by Leovincible. Check out this analog horror video by him:

How To Play
  • WASD - Move
  • Mouse - Aim
  • Left Click - Pick up keys
  • Shift - Run
